expo.name: SaverDemo
expo.description:
Third Day Saver App
 - Can increase by tapping
 - Click "Add a Saver" to bring up a form
 - The form now works. Add new "Savers here
 - Format and colour change
 - Information from the form is set to individual states, then they are all set to one state object, and then pushed to the object array <FlatList>
 - Delete button added on swipe left - Does not work yet
 - Full width now
Removed
 - Click "Delete Saver" to add a button the the centre (it is pre-set) 

05/09/202
 - Added colour picker
 - Scrollable - but not correct apparently
 - Colour changes

07/09/2020
 - Added an edit page
 - The 2d.p now does not work though
 - Added an information panel for instructions

14/09/2020
 - Expo has not saved my prevoius comments
 - NAvigation working
 - Welcome screen
 - Login Screen
 - FireBAse worked for a minute, but then not again after that
 - Reorganised folders
 - The welcome and login screens look better now
 - Re-did what the Saver looks like
 - Changed the Saver screen - added a footer - Changed background colour
 - Added an Edit and transaction button

15/09/2020
 - Added optional goal 
 - When the goal is not there, it does not appear on the saver
 - Added the "when to transfer money" option
 - Updated Warning

19/09/2020
 - Scroll Views on the modals
 - Added ideas and transfer info modals
 - Updated the edit screen to reflect the add screen 

21/09/2020
 - Delete function now works
 - Added info to the information tab

21/09/2020
 - Added further switches and information to the Add Modal
 - You can now close the numeric pads
 - No Transfer options - Currently takes the transfer button off the Saver
 - Variable saver option - Does not work yet
 - Started adding the account detail section 

08/12/2020
 - updates being kept on Github
